price: Tue Meinen Dienern kund, daß Ich es bin, der Allvergebend und Barmherzig ist,
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
